#summary How the language files will be organized
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Design

=Summary=
A language text file will have a list of Strings that each have an ID associated with them. The format for IDs are as follows:

{{{
GameFrame (1 - 20)
1 = frameTitle
2 = pdButtonLabel
3 = sbButtonLabel
4 = saeButtonLabel
5 = ewsButtonLabel


SettingsFrame (21 - 40)
21 = frameTitle
22 = yourName
23 = opponent
24 = welcomeMessage
25 = human
26 = computer
27 = addPlayer
28 = begin
29 = language

OpponentPanel (41 - 60)
41 = frameTitle

PhaseDescriptionFrame (61 - 80)
62 = phaseLabel
63 = numCardsLabel
64 = scoreLabel


ScoreFrame (81 - 100)
81 = frameTitle
82 = scoreMessage
83 = placeLabel
84 = NameLabel
85 = currentPhaseLabel
86 = scoreLabel

skipInputFrame (101 - 120)
101 = frameTitle
102 = skipPrompt
103 = skipButtonLabel
{{{
